Uses of Class
org.floj.core.Block

  • Packages that use Block 
    Package Description
    org.floj.core
    The core package contains classes for network messages like Block and Transaction, peer connectivity via PeerGroup, and block chain management.
    org.floj.core.listeners  
    org.floj.jni  
    org.floj.params
    Network parameters encapsulate some of the differences between different FLO networks such as the main network, the testnet, regtest mode, unit testing params and so on.
    org.floj.utils
    Formatting monetary amounts, representing exchange rates, a program for loading FLO Core saved block files, a class to control how floj uses threads and misc other utility classes that don't fit anywhere else.
